support_summary: The ATXN3-VCP/p97 complex promotes the extraction of the E3 ubiquitin ligase RNF8 from sites of DNA damage to prevent its overaccumulation and ensure proper double-strand break repair.

functions.cellular_process: The ATXN3-VCP/p97 complex regulates the homeostasis of the E3 ubiquitin ligase RNF8, a key factor in DNA repair, at sites of genotoxic stress.
functions.effect_description: During the DNA damage response, the ATXN3-VCP complex facilitates the extraction of RNF8 from chromatin. This prevents the hyper-accumulation of RNF8 at DNA lesions, which is crucial for balancing DNA repair pathway choice and promoting cell survival.
biological_consequence: DNA damage → RNF8 accumulates on chromatin → ATXN3-VCP complex extracts RNF8 → RNF8 levels are balanced → DNA repair pathway choice is regulated → Cell survival is promoted
specific_effects: Stimulates the extraction of RNF8 from chromatin at sites of DNA lesions.
Suppresses overaccumulation of RNF8 at sites of DNA damage.
Deubiquitinates soluble RNF8 to protect it from premature degradation.
